alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 07 at 9:20AM CST until January 08 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... White River at Hazleton affecting Knox and Gibson Counties. White River at Petersburg affecting Pike, Daviess, Gibson and Knox Counties. Wabash River at Mount Carmel affecting Edwards, Posey, Wabash, White, Gibson, Knox and Gallatin Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at Riverton affecting Sullivan, Knox, Crawford and Lawrence Counties. Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site affecting Sullivan, Knox, Crawford and Lawrence Counties. .Upwards of two inches of rainfall this past weekend put several rivers across central Indiana into flood. Minor flooding is expected to continue on the lower Wabash River through this weekend...and on the lower White River through early next week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Seep water occurs behind levees on Indiana side. Hutson Creek begins to overflow from backwater. Old Darwin Road and a few rural roads in eastern Clark and Crawford counties in Illinois are impassable. Low agricultural land floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 8.3 feet Monday, January 17. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this evening by around 915 PM CST /1015 PM EST/.
